cloud.title: GoodCloud
cloud.tips: With GoodCloud, you can manage routers in groups, check real-time router status, set up routers remotely, operate routers in batch and monitor connected clients etc.
cloud.add_id_tips: Please use this ID to bind the device to your cloud account.
cloud.unbind_tips: Are you sure you want to unbind the device with GoodCloud? The device is bound to:
cloud.unbind_note: Note: This will only take effect in the selected region. If you bound this device on different regions, do this on each region.
cloud.unbound_tips: The device is not bonded to any cloud account.
cloud.token_invalid_tips: Device security key verification failed, please go to $$$$ to reset the security token or rebind the device.
